meanings.definition: Relating to the time before menstruation.
meanings.sent2: Her premenstrual symptoms included bloating and irritability.
meanings.sent3: During the premenstrual phase, she avoided spicy foods.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the air felt premenstrually charged.
meanings.sent5: The premenstrual period can be challenging for many women.

meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of the period before menstruation.
meanings.sent2: She premenstrually craved chocolate and sweets.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly blamed his forgetfulness on acting premenstrually.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room rose premenstrually.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere was premenstrually tense before the meeting.
